scripts.build:main: mkdir -p build/scripts && rollup -i ./client/scripts/main.js -o ./build/scripts/main.js -c -m && cd build/scripts && uglifyjs --source-map main.min.js.map -m --screw-ie8 main.js -o main.min.js && wc -c main.min.js
scripts.build:sw: mkdir -p build           && rollup -i ./client/scripts/sw.js     -o ./build/sw.js   -c -m       && cd build && uglifyjs --source-map sw.min.js.map   -m --screw-ie8 sw.js   -o sw.min.js   && wc -c sw.min.js
scripts.build:other: mkdir -p build/scripts && cp client/* build/ || true && cp -r client/images build/images && cp ./node_modules/sw-toolbox/sw-toolbox.* ./build/ && cp ./node_modules/color-thief/src/color-thief.js ./build/scripts/
scripts.watch: bash ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./client/scripts -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client/styles -e scss --exec npm run build:styles" "nodemon --watch ./client -e css,html,png,json --exec npm run build:other" "nodemon --watch ./server -e js --exec npm run start"
scripts.build: npm run clean; bash ./parallel.sh "npm run build:other" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:styles"
